articles.author: Tumaini Carayol
articles.title: Zidansek and Pavlyuchenkova reach French Open semis after epic battles - The Guardian
articles.description: Tamara Zidansek and Anatstasia Pavlyuchenkova reached the semi-finals of the French Open, continuing the series of unexpected results in the women’s singles at Roland Garros
articles.content:
French Open 2021
  • Tamara Zidansek secures victory over Paula Badosa 7-5, 4-6, 8-6
  • Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova beats Elena Rybakina 6-7 (2), 6-2, 9-7
Never before in the open era… [+4756 chars]

articles.title: Raids worldwide as police reveal vast hack of criminal encrypted phones - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Dubbed "Operation Trojan Shield", forces in 16 countries monitored as members of the mafia, Asian crime syndicates and outlaw motorcycle gangs discussed drug deals, money laundering and even gangland hits.

articles.title: Residents of Punggol HDB block to be tested for Covid-19 after 8 cases detected - AsiaOne
